description: Description Source: [Inner Sea World Guide](source:Inner Sea World Guide)
A character must choose one Hellknight order to join. The choice of order determines what disciplines the character gains access to.

list.name: Order of the Chain
list.short_description: These Hellknights serve as wardens and trackers devoted to hunting down the enemies of society and locking away dangerous criminals.

list.name: Order of the Gate
list.short_description: Dominated by spellcasting signifers who employ magic in surveillance, manipulation, and execution, this order is known for predicting crimes and creating magical innovations.

list.name: Order of the Godclaw
list.short_description: Crusaders in the service of a pantheon of five lawful deities, these Hellknights bring order wherever it is needed, usually by force. Their unusual faith is understood by few.

list.name: Order of the Nail
list.short_description: These knights at the vanguard of civilization bring order to frontier settlements and stamp out those who impede society's march.

list.name: Order of the Pyre
list.short_description: With spell and blade, this order seeks out superstition and witchcraft and destroys any chaotic cults that threaten the minds and souls of law-abiding citizens.

list.name: Order of the Rack
list.short_description: These Hellknights root out and quell subversive knowledge and destructive ideas they believe capable of impeding order's march.

list.name: Order of the Scourge
list.short_description: Using their vast wealth and resources, these armored sleuths work- sometimes under cover-to take down corrupt politicians, thieves' guilds, and bastions of organized crime.

list.name: Order of the Coil
list.short_description: A small order of Hellknights that seeks to wipe out the native inhabitants of Sargava in the name of civilization

list.name: Order of the Crux
list.short_description: A remnant of the Chelish civil war, these butchers were destroyed by the Order of the Scourge, but have risen again in unlife

list.name: Order of the Glyph
list.short_description: An unofficial band of Hellknights, charged with protecting the true history of Cheliax

list.name: Order of the Pike
list.short_description: Monster-slayers and heroes, this order dedicates itself to wiping out dangerous creatures.

list.name: Order of the Scar
list.short_description: Mercenary assassin-hunters, this order protects its charges and oppsess the Daggermark Guild and the followers of Achaekek.

list.name: Order of the Torrent
list.short_description: A good order of Hellknights that focus their efforts on rescuing hostages and kidnapping victims.

list.name: Order of the Wall
list.short_description: These hellknights serve as guardians and watchmen against the forces that would intrude on the borders of civilization
